description: The masked Gundam Fighter who represents the space colony of Neo Germany. A master of German Ninjutsu, Schwarz has near-magical powers of stealth and deception; he can appear and disappear at will, disguise himself with ease, and confound his foes with illusions and Ninja trickery. Fortunately for Domon Kasshu, this mysterious fighter seems to be on his side, appearing at key moments to protect Domon from danger and teach him the discipline of a true warrior.
name: Schwarz Bruder
